Text: Following the decision to shelve the #BAME #Covid_19 inquiry report - limited in scope as it was - we're re-posting our studies on the UK https://t.co/7uQvcDAZ58 ; Scotland https://t.co/2RYjTaEXed which catalogue the racial dynamics central to the disproportionality. Please share
